channel.title: My First EXE Not hello world ;)
channel.description: Alright so I had VB for a while now, never actually played with it until now...I've spent about 2 hours playing around with it and this I've made a "Guesser" It can guess numbers till a specific value in order to conserve precious system memory =). It doesn't use something like e.g. [code]if txt.Text = 1 then MsgBox "1"[/code] Instead it uses ...(tada) loops ;D or using while...yep.. If it took me about 2 hours to do all this then it can take you like 30 mins :| Source code is included!

item.title: My First EXE Not hello world ;)
item.dc:creator: @oblivian oblivian
item.description:
@oblivian wrote:

i took u 2 hours to make!

all u have to do is

private sub command1_click()
dim number as integer
number = text1.text
msgbox"Gessing.."
Msgbox"It is the number" + number +"!!"
end sub

Read full topic
item.source: My First EXE Not hello world ;)

if txt.Text = 1 then MsgBox "1" Instead it uses …(tada) loops ;D or using while…yep… If it took me about 2 hours to do all this then it can take you like 30 mins Source code is included!
